data.title: Philip Spalding to Wed Jill G. Weldon, Editor
data.text:
Henry H. Weldon of New York and Amagansett, L.I., and Mrs. Nathan Milstein of London have announced the engagement of their daugh ter, Miss Jill Gloria Weldon, who is literary editor of British Vogue, to Philip Lef fingwell Spalding, a docu mentary‚Äêfilm producer. He is the son of Philip Spalding of Santa Barbara, Calif., and Sydney, Australia, and the late Mrs. Emily Thomas Spalding Jacob of Morris town, N. J.

The couple plan to be mar ried in London on April 2.

Miss Weldon, an alumna of Miss Porter's School, attended Radcliffe College and was graduated from Sarah Law rence College. She made her debut in 1956 at a supper dance given by her parents at the Ambassador Hotel here, was presented at the Debutante Cotillion and Christmas Ball and was a member of the Junior Assem blies.

Her father is president of Weldon Farm Products, Inc., dairy manufacturers. Her stepfather is the concert vio linist.

Mr. Spalding, whose per manent address is Bellota Ranch, the family holding near Tucson, Ariz., works in New York and London. He was graduated from the Thacher School in Ojai, Calif., and from Yale University.
